sentences.sContent: The boy had indigestion,and he regurgitated all his food.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy had indigestion,and he regurgitated all his food.
sentences.sCn: 这个男孩消化不良，把吃下的东西全吐了出来。

sentences.sContent: So do not think that you are collectively having heart attacks, indigestion, or anything else.
sentences.sContent_eng: So do not think that you are collectively having heart attacks, indigestion, or anything else.
sentences.sCn: 不要认为你们是全体心脏病发作，消化不良，或者其它任何疾病。

sentences.sContent: Aspirin may occasionally cause irritation of the stomach and so if symptoms of indigestion or heartburn develop it should be stopped.
sentences.sContent_eng: Aspirin may occasionally cause irritation of the stomach and so if symptoms of indigestion or heartburn develop it should be stopped.
sentences.sCn: 阿斯匹林有时导致胃部不适，所以如果发生消化不良或胃灼热那么应该停药。

trans.tranOther: pain that you get when your stomach cannot break down food that you have eaten
